name: LEAF (itch) (Simondtd)
description:
The jellyfish has ordered you to stabilize the worlds. 

Leaf is an exploration driven action adventure game where you're on a quest to stabilize two parallell worlds. On your adventure you stumble across hidden weapons, spells and special items that might help you on your journey.

Key Features
  • Explore an abandoned world
  • Fight monsters and defeat challenging bosses
  • Seek powerful items and hidden areas
  • Enjoy the beautiful soundtrack
